text: @PhilipCaseFW @FarmersWeekly Rivers are meant to flood, they are natural and have protection. The actions have devastated this stretch of the Lugg and the protected species which rely on and it probably won‚Äôt recover for decades. Let‚Äôs hope the @EnvAgency use their powers under the Environmental Damage Regs

We‚Äôve been working with @EnvAgencySW to deliver a plan that will better protect homes and businesses from flooding whilst creating green spaces, habitats and places to enjoy nature. 

What do you think?
